name: JoyChristianArabicRadio
0:
”Alexa, open joy christian arabic radio”
”Alexa, start joy christian arabic radio”
”Alexa, ask joy christian arabic radio what's playing”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: joy christian arabic radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Within the pages of the Gospel, Jesus’ teachings have touched millions upon millions of lives throughout history. Somewhere in the world, there are people discovering Christ’s message for the first time, and in the days and weeks ahead, they will hunger for me, wishing to learn everything that there is to learn about our Lord and Savior. That is why we are launching Joy Christian Arabic Radio, to spread the Gospel even further and to preach the Good News to all who want to hear it.
 
A Christian Arabic radio station, Joy Christian Arabic Radio will broadcast the joy of Christ to all the Arab nations. We are confident that there is an unmet need for media such as ours, and we are exciting to fill that need. All our lives, Christ has been there for us, leading us and guiding us through our darkest times and our most significant challenges. We know what He can do for those who listen to Him
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
